channel.title: Luckscape v2
channel.description:
Yo!
(DONT FLAME.... CUZ MOST OF U ARE BEST IN IT)
After working for another 2 weeks on my server, and after RS made OLD wildy back and free trade, I decided not to work future with a server and just release it as a v2 of my future Luckscape sources. I got 250+ downloads in like 4days. so i'm guessing people are kind of waiting on the v2. I have improved some stuff, added some stuff and deleted some stuff to make the server better for you.
THIS SERVER IS HOST READY!! + WEBCLIENT READY! Go on and leech. Idc much.
~Server features
- PVP DROPS! (Now drops artifacts!) - Correct Chaotic animations! - VLS spec! - All Godswords spec - Improved DCLAWS (Now hits 4x on npc and players!) - All other specs works! - Correct animation for any axe @ woodcutting! - SKILL interfaces for every skill! (more detailed!) - CUSTOM HOME (Not the stupid egdeville :p ) - Customs + Bonuses!) - Added DONATOR zone - Added DONATOR tab (with working functions) * you need to be a donator to open this tab!* - Corporeal beast! (Needs to be a donator!) - Added Welcome interface WITH rules! - Npc that resets stats + Npc that locks XP - NPC that give u a DFS only IF you got a visage + 1m cash! - Added lvl 1-2-3 clue scrolls, DROPPED BY EVERY NPC IN GAME! (Lvl 3 only by BOSSES!) - WORKING OVERLOADS! (No way to get ATM, so you have to add it to a drop or to a shop. - CUSTOM ASSAULT (the very very old one like delta had (was to lazy to seacrh for something original)
~Client features
- Current rs EQUIPMENT interface - 508 SHOP interface - Current rs TRADE interface - Added CUSTOMS!
~Pictures
[center]WELCOME INTERFACE
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2ch2wbl.png[/img]
EQUIPMENT INTERFACE
[URL=http://img821.imageshack.us/i/equipmentinterface.png/][IMG]http://img821.imageshack.us/img821/590/equipmentinterface.png[/img][/URL]
WORKING CLUE SCROLLS!!! (This is level 3 clue)
[URL=http://img268.imageshack.us/i/cluescrolls.png/][IMG]http://img268.imageshack.us/img268/3488/cluescrolls.png[/img][/URL]
INGAME HIGHSCORES! (Thx to Demise)
[IMG]http://img641.imageshack.us/img641/8397/highscores.png[/img]
SKILL INTERFACES! (1 For every skill, So much more detailed NOW!
[URL=http://img511.imageshack.us/i/skillinterfaces.png/][IMG]http://img511.imageshack.us/img511/7896/skillinterfaces.png[/img][/URL]
OVERLOADS! (WORKS !)
[IMG]http://img714.imageshack.us/i/9ua.mp4[/img]
STATS YOU GET FROM OVERLOAD!
[URL=http://img525.imageshack.us/i/overloadskills.png/][IMG]http://img525.imageshack.us/img525/9807/overloadskills.png[/img][/URL]
PVP ARTIFACTS!
[URL=http://img222.imageshack.us/i/pvpartifacts.png/][IMG]http://img222.imageshack.us/img222/1494/pvpartifacts.png[/img][/URL]
ONCE CLICKED AN ARTIFACT!!
[URL=http://img696.imageshack.us/i/clickedartifacts.png/][IMG]http://img696.imageshack.us/img696/9493/clickedartifacts.png[/img][/URL]
THE CURRENT QUEST TAB!
[URL=http://img546.imageshack.us/i/questtab.png/][IMG]http://img546.imageshack.us/img546/1604/questtab.png[/img][/URL]
OVERVIEW OF CUSTOM HOME (NOT EGDEVILLE w00t!)
[IMG]http://img199.imageshack.us/i/23415191.mp4/[/img]
VENG EMOTE FULLY WORKS!!!
[URL=http://img153.imageshack.us/i/vengemote.png/][IMG]http://img153.imageshack.us/img153/4844/vengemote.png[/img][/URL]
CHAOTIC MAUL stand!
[URL=http://img10.imageshack.us/i/chaoticmaulstand.png/][IMG]http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/7418/chaoticmaulstand.png[/img][/URL]
VESTAS LONGSWORD SPEC ANIMATION
[URL=http://img525.imageshack.us/i/vlsspec.png/][IMG]http://img525.imageshack.us/img525/527/vlsspec.png[/img][/URL]
For the haters - CUSTOMS!
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/11rvg9k.png[/img]
[/CENTER]
DOWNLOADS:
[url=http://uppit.com/o9gudackvx3h/Luckscape_client_v2.rar]Luckscape v2 CLIENT![/url]
[url=http://uppit.com/pl2hg46jkvbt/Luckscape_source.rar]Luckscape v2 SOURCES[/url]
Normally the CACHE should auto-download. If it DOESNT. then plz download the following link and EXTRACT the file! not the items in it! in your C:/!
[url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/17692331/LuckscapeCache.zip]Luckscape v2 CACHE[/url]
